activities: Aspire Lifestyles (America) Inc., is an International SOS Group company.  It provides concierge services and assistance solutions.  For that purpose Aspire Lifestyles may collect information related to provide a complete business to business program support to its client base of financial institutions, insurance, hospitality and customer loyalty schemes all around the world. Personal information is collected directly from individuals when they choose to provide to Aspire Lifestyles with their personal information by subscribing to products or services sold by Aspire Lifestyles.
